item.description:
Melissa is organizing this meetup event - please contact her in the message board

Hey everyone.
Just wanted to post a meetup event that seems to have some interest already. The plan is to go to Mt. Sunapee Saturday February 7. I'll be driving from Somerville but might have a full car already. It takes an hour and a half to two hours to drive up there, so we can meet up in the lodge at 9am if that seems like a good time to everyone.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lodge at 10am
item.name: Mount Sunapee
